Help.Description: Xml2Dox is an application that allows to generate a documentation for xsl file

Command.Name: xsl
Command.Description: Launch the generation of a xml documentation

Parameters.Parameter: The file path that need the generation of documentation. The path can describe a folder or a file. If it's a folder , we take all the file present

Option.Name: /S
Option.Value: Include the sub file when the path describe a folder

Option.Name: /F
Option.Value: Allow to specify the format of the documentation. Default format is xml. List of the possible format : XML - HTML

Option.Name: /O
Option.Value: Allow to specify an output file. Default the application take the folder where is the xml/xsl file

Command.Name: version
Command.Description: Show the version of the application

Command.Name: help
Command.Description: Show the data for the different commands available

Parameters.Parameter: (Optionnel) Permet d'avoir les details d'une commande precise. Non renseigne une liste de base de toute les commandes est affichées

Option.Name: /D
Option.Value: Donne toute la liste detaillee de toutes les commandes disponibles

Command.Name: config
Command.Description: Permet de lancer un processus de documentation en fonction d'un fichier de configuration

Parameters.Parameter: Le chemin vers le fichier de configuration
